headline: Netflix doesn't need Warner Bros, but an acquisition can unlock access to "best of breed" IP, says former Netflix executive
summary: Simon Gallagher of SPG Globa,l and a former content acquisition and strategy executive at Netflix and Hulu, shares his view about the bidding war between Netflix and Paramount for Warner Bros, and its potential impact on everyday consumers.

raw.headline: Netflix doesn't need Warner Bros, but an acquisition can unlock access to "best of breed" IP, says former Netflix executive

headline: Warner Bros. Falls Below Netflix Offer as Bidding War Hopes Cool
summary: Shares of Warner Bros. fell 2.1% Thursday to close at $27.61, below the $27.75 a share offer in cash and stock that Netflix agreed to pay for the firm’s studios, streaming and HBO businesses.  The move lower comes after Warner Bros. advised its shareholders to reject Paramount’s all-cash bid of $30 a share for the entire company, including its cable networks, like CNN and TNT.

raw.headline: Warner Bros. Falls Below Netflix Offer as Bidding War Hopes Cool
raw.summary: Shares of Warner Bros. fell 2.1% Thursday to close at $27.61, below the $27.75 a share offer in cash and stock that Netflix agreed to pay for the firm’s studios, streaming and HBO businesses.  The move lower comes after Warner Bros. advised its shareholders to reject Paramount’s all-cash bid of $30 a share for the entire company, including its cable networks, like CNN and TNT.

headline: Netflix vs. Intel: Why this portfolio mgr. recommends only one
